sense.def:
The weight of something
pomeni, kako težko je nekaj. To lahko merimo z enotami, na primer kilogrami ali funti.

seg.quote: The weight of the load is too great.
It was 25 metres long and 30 tons in weight.

sense.def:
A weight
je kovinski predmet, za katerega vemo, koliko tehta. Take predmete uporabljamo za tehtanje.

Težak predmet lahko imenujemo
a weight
.

seg.quote: I'm not allowed to carry heavy weights any more.

sense.def:
To weight something
ali
to weight something down
pomeni na nekaj ali v nekaj dati nekaj težkega, pogosto zato, da se ne more zlahka premakniti.

seg.quote: ...a plastic sheet weighted down with straw bales.

sense.def:
The weight of something
je velika količina ali moč nečesa, zaradi česar tistemu težko ugovarjamo ali nasprotujemo.

seg.quote: They had the weight of official support behind them.

sense.def:
To feel a weight of some kind on oneself
pomeni imeti odgovornost ali težavo, ki povzroča skrbi.

seg.quote: Without a producer, the weight of responsibility fell upon me.

sense.def:
To pull one's weight
pomeni delati tako trdo kot druge osebe, vpletene v isto nalogo ali dejavnost.
